data.md:MetaData: 0-4 cm: dark grey mud, 4-31 cm: grey mud, lowest 5 cm mit light grey laminations/layering 2-10 mm thick and Cerastoderma edule overlying 1 cm brown peat at 31-32 cm. 32-47 cm: brown fine sandy mud with numerous shell fragments forming whitish layers 40-47 cm. 47-52 cm: dark reddish brown peat. 52-64/65.5 cm Light olive brown sandy mud (gyttja) with carbonaceous matter. Irregular boundary to light grey Till 64/65.5 cm-75 cm.
